title: [oc5 - oc6beta2] - similar display names
body:
hi :)

when i was writing on my owncloud chat-app i found out that there is a security problem with the display-name. because if there are more than one person with the same display-name every share function will display the double names. so a user must click though every single (double) name, to find out the right user he wants to share with.

only oc6 shows for a short second the real name, after it changes again to the display name. in the current oc5 (5.0.12) there is no opportunity for a user finding out the right user. (by the way, he do not share with both users which have the same display-name)

maybe the "getsharewith"-object shows the wrong content? (

$.get(oc.filepath('core', 'ajax', 'share.php'), {
			fetch : 'getsharewith',
			search : search.term,
[...]

greetings

ps: hope you will find a better solution :/
